channel.title: Exception in thread "Thread-5" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException
channel.description:
Can anyone please point me in the right direction for this error?
[CODE]Exception in thread "Thread-5" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 55563 at ItemDef.forID(ItemDef.java:12) at ItemDef.getSprite(ItemDef.java:675) at client.drawInterface(client.java:9957) at client.draw3dScreen(client.java:10655) at client.method146(client.java:14618) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:9748) at client.processDrawing(client.java:10588) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108) at client.run(client.java:6074) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/CODE]
I have no idea what means what haha, so if someone knows what some do that will help greatly thanks.

item.title: Exception in thread "Thread-5" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException
item.dc:creator: @killdogz killdogz
item.description:
@killdogz wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:2, topic:423916”]It has something to do with items 0_o…

How do you replicate this error[/quote]

It happens when i log in that’s the confusing part lol and not sure which codes its at since when i compare the codes from the 2 locations in the itemdef there all the same :s

EDIT: Fixed it now.
